name: ABPeoplePickerNavigationControllerDelegate
desc: The ABPeoplePickerNavigationControllerDelegate protocol describes the interface ABPeoplePickerNavigationController delegates must adopt to respond to people-picker user events.DeprecatedUse CNContactPickerDelegate instead.
